channel.title: Creative_commons on Perl programming news, code and culture
channel.description: Recent content in Creative_commons on Perl programming news, code and culture

item.title: How to install any* Perl module
item.description:
It’s our 200th article! Installing CPAN modules can be a pain, particularly for users not familiar with the Perl toolchain. To try something different, I’m uploading the article as an image file under creative commons. Feel free to share it, use it, whatever. If you use Perl at your office, maybe print it out for reference. You can download a copy here.

[*] You can install any Perl module, but it may not be a good ideaâ„¢
